source.sqlReaderQuery:
declare @Today datetime=getutcdate()
select INC.IncKeyName,INC.IncValue,SourceSchemaName,SourceObjectName,ObjectType,'['+TargetSchemaName+'_STAGE].['+TargetObjectName+']' as TargetObjectName, ADLSPreProcessedPath, ADLSProcessedPath, BlobLogsPath,convert(varchar,@Today,112)+'/'+replace(convert(varchar, @Today, 8),':','') as Today,CHECKSUMCOLUMNS 
,case when INC.INCVALUE is null then '' else 'Where '+  INC.INCKEYNAME+' >= '''+ cast(INC.INCVALUE as NVARCHAR(50)) + ''' AND ' + INC.INCKEYNAME + ' < ''' + cast(@Today as NVARCHAR(50)) + '''' END AS WhereCondition 
,@Today AS TimeNow,INC.OBJECTSLISTID,OL.ContainerName
From bi.MM_ObjectsList  OL
INNER join bi.MM_INCREMENTALKEYS INC on INC.objectslistid=OL.ID and INC.type='UPD' and INC.ISACTIVE=1
where OL.SourceServer='Oracle' and OL.IsActive = 1 and OL.LOADTYPE='INCREMENTAL'

Summary.value: Listing Tables To Process is Failed

value.value: @concat('Copied Data To Blob Storage For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Copying Data To Blob Storage is Failed For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Copied Data From Blob Storage To SQL For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Copying Data From Blob Storage To SQL is Failed For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Copied File From PreProcessed Folder to Processed Folder For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Copying File From PreProcessed To Processed Folder is Failed For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('File is deleted from PreProcessed Folder For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Deleting file from PreProcessed Folder is Failed For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)
@concat('Updating Incremental Key Value is Failed For Table : ',item().SourceObjectName)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
declare @Today datetime=getutcdate()
select INC.IncKeyName,INC.IncValue,SourceSchemaName,SourceObjectName,ObjectType,'['+TargetSchemaName+'].['+TargetObjectName+']' as TargetObjectName, ADLSPreProcessedPath, ADLSProcessedPath, BlobLogsPath,convert(varchar,@Today,112)+'/'+replace(convert(varchar, @Today, 8),':','') as Today,CHECKSUMCOLUMNS 
,case when INC.INCVALUE is null then '' else 'Where '+  INC.INCKEYNAME+' >= '''+ convert(VARCHAR,INC.INCVALUE,121) + ''' AND ' + INC.INCKEYNAME + ' < ''' + convert(VARCHAR,@Today ,121) + '''' END AS WhereCondition 
,@Today AS TimeNow,INC.OBJECTSLISTID,OL.ContainerName
From bi.MM_ObjectsList  OL
Left join bi.MM_INCREMENTALKEYS INC on INC.objectslistid=OL.ID and INC.type='INS' and INC.ISACTIVE=1
where OL.SourceServer='Salesforce' and OL.IsActive = 1 and OL.LOADTYPE='INCREMENTAL'

Summary.value: Listing Tables To Process is Failed
